title: AutomatedSQLi Log Schema v1
description: Unified JSON-lines schema for proxy, orchestrator, db_logger and analysis components.

timestamp.description: ISO8601 UTC timestamp when the event was observed (e.g. 2025-11-09T09:32:15Z).

trace_id.description: Canonical trace id (UUIDv4 lowercase). Header name: X-Trace-ID.

src_ip.description: Source IP address (client or internal caller). Store as string â€” sanitize in upstream if necessary.

headers.description: Representative headers. Components SHOULD NOT log full sensitive headers (see schema.md).

params.description: Query/form parameters after sanitization/hashing as defined in schema.md.

body_snippet.description: Short, redacted snippet of request or payload for debugging (PII redacted).

db_query.description: Database query text (with sensitive tokens hashed). Prefer hashed placeholders, see schema.md.

label.description: Classification label assigned by analyzer or operator.

hash_salt_id.description: Identifier for the salt key in secrets manager (do not store actual salt here).
